name: Wild Gorilla Attack Simulator 2016:Wildlife of Ape
name_original: Wild Gorilla Attack Simulator 2016:Wildlife of Ape
description:
Wild Gorilla Attack Simulator 2016:Wildlife of Ape:

The most realistic and beautiful Gorilla Simulator.
Live life as real wild gorilla and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Explore a massive world full of dangerous animals and carnivores. Danger is at every turn in the wild. Play smart and attack wisely. Gain experience and boost skills to hunt deathly or weaker animals. Deliver killer blows by leaping, pouncing and ambushing enemy prey.
Wild Gorilla Attack Simulator 2016:Wildlife of Ape is 3d simulation game, play as African smartest species like chimpanzees. Evil humans are destroying jungles to get woods and land for constructing city play as wild ape on rampage and smash their dreams in ashes. All forest animals are terrified from this crazy big ape, they will attack you so hit them back with your mighty strength so show them who is king of the jungle. Attack panther, cheetah, deer, bear, wolf, hippo, elephant, zebra and lion, crocodiles within the given time. Preserve your tropical forest from destruction by human hands, beat them all with your strength and speed.
Fight against ferocious beasts like Black Panther, lion, cheetah, wolf or bear. Face forest ruthless beast and battle for your survival. Get crazy and enjoy playing with this real gorilla action pack simulation game. This game offers excellent graphics, and easy to control Gorilla and plenty of things to attack.

Wild Jungle Gorilla Simulator Features:
Challenging 25 missions to survive against wild predators
Stunning 3D graphics with superb jungle locations
Real life gorilla animations for jumping, roars, pumping chest, smashing objects and more
Wild animals animations with artificial intelligence for saving life and running away
Awesome HD graphics
Attractive Gameplay
